channel.title: Better face creation system
channel.description:
I'm sure you've all seen my forum topic where i asked about modifying the Face Creation system, and was eventually successfully in doing so. I've now made the chances of seeing different characters per play through up from 20% to 70%. Which characters does this include? All of them except the female scientists because they're more complicated to modify then the other models. I've also tweaked the scientists to wear all their glasses or none at all. So any here is the download link:
[url]https://filesmelt.com/dl/Better_Face_creation_system3.7z[/url]
If anyone feels like uploading screenshots feel free to do so, I may upload some new ones myself tomorrow. :wink:

item.title: Better face creation system
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
dragunov2:

Yes, upload some new screenshots

And do we need any other pack aswell?

No this one is made to only work with vanilla Black mesa.

Also to the guy asking about security guards having white hands I don’t have a problem with this so it might be on your end. Or maybe it just looks like their hands are white. I’ve also found a few glitches that I’m going to repair soon.

Read full topic
